VERIFICATION_DESCRIPTION: Please provide your username before entering the verification code.
RESET_FORGOT_DESCRIPTION: An email with the verification code has been sent to your registered email address. Kindly check and enter below.
PASSWORD_POLICY_ERROR: New Password must follow password policy
CONFIRM_PASSWORD_ERROR: Confirm password must match new password
SUCCESS_CHANGE_PASSWORD: Please log in again with the new credentials
ALREADY_HAVE_VERIFICATION_CODE: I already have a verification code
LOGIN_FOOTER_TEXT: To continue, Squarehealth will share your email address and preference with Aviva Group. You can review Aviva Group Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
INCORRECT_USERNAME_PASSWORD: Incorrect log in credentials. Please try again
FORGOT_PASSWORD_SUCCESS_TEXT: Check your inbox for an email with details how to reset your password
FORGOT_USERNAME_MESSAGE: Your username is the email address you used to register. If you can’t remember this or its not working, please email us at
WEAK_LOCKOUT_MESSAGE: You have entered your password wrong 5 times and for security the account is locked. To gain access, please request a new password to unlock your account, by clicking the Forgot Password link
UNAUTHORISED_MESSAGE: You are not authorized user to access this portal
INVALID_VERIFICATION_CODE: The verification code entered is invalid or has expired.
ATTEMPT_EXCEEDED: Attempt limit exceeded, please try after some time.

PASSWORD_RULES.name: It must be unique to previous 5 passwords

VERIFICATION_CODE_EXPIRE: The verification code entered has expired. An email has been sent to your email address with a new verification code
VERIFICATION_LOCK_OUT_MESSAGE: Sorry, you have entered the verification code incorrect 3 times and now it has expired. Please click on ‘Forgot Password’ and follow the steps to request a new code
TEMP_PASS_MESSAGE: Temporary password has expired and must be reset by an administrator.
TEMP_PASS_EXPIRE: Your temporary password has expired. A new temporary password has been sent to your registered email address
REQUIRED_PASSWORD_USERNAME: Please enter your username and password
FORGOT_PASSWORD_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: An email with instructions on how to reset your password has been sent to your registered email address. Please check your email to proceed further.
REQUIRED_PASSWORD_AND_CONFIRM_PASSWORD: Please enter your password and confirm password
REQUIRED_CONFIRM_NEW_PASSWORD: Please enter your confirm new password
REQUIRED_PASSWORD_AND_CONFIRM_NEW_PASSWO: Please enter your new password and confirm new password
UNABLE_TO_PROCESS_REQUEST: we are unable to process your request
